sys_update_xml.name: sp_angular_provider_55ab4e40dbf39f0054d8ff621f961970
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>GCPFetchDropdownOption</name><script><![CDATA[function GCPFetchDropdownOption($http){
	this.getOptions = function(sessionId, dropdownName){
		return new Promise(function(resolve, reject){
			$http({
				url: '/api/x_naci_gcp/gcprestapi/getDropOptions',
				 method : "GET",
				 beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId); },
				 headers: {'Content-Type': 'application/json'},
				 params: {name:dropdownName}				
			}).then(resolve, reject);
		});
	};
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-03 18:38:03</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>55ab4e40dbf39f0054d8ff621f961970</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GCPFetchDropdownOption</sys_name><sys_package display_value="gcp" source="x_naci_gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_55ab4e40dbf39f0054d8ff621f961970</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>yuw5@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-03 22:51:47</sys_updated_on><type>service</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysevent_email_action_c4d3dafedbc0a300b86770c08c96190f
sys_update_xml.payload:
falsefalsetruec97d83137f4432005f58108c3ffa917ax_naci_gcp_gcp_tasktext/html 

 

]]>falsex_naci_gcp.gcp_past_due_reminderfalsetruefalsefalseeventfalseevent.parm1falseDear ${employee_name}, 

Our records show that your Good Clinical Practice training has expired and you have not yet completed the required renewal training. As you know, you are required to complete a Good Clinical Practice training course at a minimum of every 3 years.   Your training was to be completed by ${certificate_renew_date}
.

This training must be completed immediately.

You may register to complete one of the following NCI recommended free GCP courses online by selecting one of the links below.

  •  National Institute on Drug Abuse (NIDA) course titled "National Drug Abuse Treatment Clinical Trials Network Good Clinical Practice"
  •  Collaborative Institutional Training Initiative Program (CITI)
  •  National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases (NIAID) GCP Learning Center
  •  NIH Good Clinical Practice for Behavioral and Social Sciences Training (00162946)

General questions or concerns about this training should be directed to your supervisor / Project Officer,  ${manager}.  If you need technical assistance or have questions regarding the training, please contact the appropriate help desk associated with the training you have selected to complete.  If you need technical assistance with uploading your document(s), please contact: NCI GCP Web Admin

 

Once you have completed your training, please go to Training Certificate Repository to upload your completed certificate(s).  For best results, please use "Print to PDF" when completing training to output a pdf to upload to this site or you may scan the printed certificate and save as a pdf to upload.

  ${mail_script:GCPSupervisorAOEmail}
]]>GCP Employee training past duefalse100falsetrue

sys_update_xml.name: sysauto_script_7fe3b66fdbff1b40b86770c08c9619c5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysauto_script"><sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><condition/><conditional>false</conditional><name>GCP check certificate expired</name><run_as display_value="Jim Zhou">7acff4a96f6f2100e04fd15eae3ee451</run_as><run_as_tz/><run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_period/><run_start>2018-08-14 18:25:20</run_start><run_time>1970-01-01 17:00:00</run_time><run_type>monthly</run_type><script><![CDATA[//query database to get all people who's certificate will be expired in three months
//either send group email or loop all people to send an individual one.
var nowDay = new GlideDateTime();
var nowDay1 = new GlideDateTime();
var nowDay2 = new GlideDateTime();
var nowDay3 = new GlideDateTime();

nowDay1.addMonthsLocalTime(1);
nowDay2.addMonthsLocalTime(2);
nowDay3.addMonthsLocalTime(3);

var userName = '';
var userId = '';
var userEmail = '';

var item = new GlideRecord('x_naci_gcp_gcp_task');
	//only active and accepted training should be counted 
	item.addQuery('stage', 'Accepted');
    item.addQuery('active', true);
    item.query();
 
while(item.next()){
    var expirationDate = item.certificate_renew_date;
    var expirationTime = new GlideDateTime(expirationDate);
	userName = item.employee_name;
	userId = item.employee_id;
    var emp = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		emp.addQuery('sys_id', userId);
		emp.query();
		emp.next();
	userEmail = emp.email;
    if(expirationTime <= nowDay1 && expirationTime >= nowDay){
	   gs.eventQueue('x_naci_gcp.send_Expired_reminder_Month',item, userName, userEmail);
    }else if(expirationTime <= nowDay2 && expirationTime >= nowDay){
		gs.eventQueue('x_naci_gcp.send_Expired_Reminder',item, userName, userEmail);
    }else if(expirationTime <= nowDay3 && expirationTime >= nowDay){
		gs.eventQueue('x_naci_gcp.send_Expired_Reminder',item, userName, userEmail);
    }   
}

]]></script><sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-14 18:28:27</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>7fe3b66fdbff1b40b86770c08c9619c5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GCP check certificate expired</sys_name><sys_package display_value="gcp" source="x_naci_gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysauto_script_7fe3b66fdbff1b40b86770c08c9619c5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>yuw5@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-17 20:58:27</sys_updated_on><upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe></sysauto_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_c676cbffdbfb5b40b86770c08c961927
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>GET</http_method><name>getReport</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	var renew_date_start = request.queryParams.renew_date_start;
	var renew_date_end = request.queryParams.renew_date_end;
	var employee_name = request.queryParams.employee_name;
	var manager_id = request.queryParams.manager_id;
	var manager_name = request.queryParams.manager_name;
	var organization = request.queryParams.organization;
	var funded_by = request.queryParams.funded_by;
	var employee_type = request.queryParams.employee_type;
	var certificate_type = request.queryParams.certificate_type;
	var stage = request.queryParams.stage;
	var active = request.queryParams.active;
	var task_items = [];
	
	var task_item = new GlideRecord('x_naci_gcp_gcp_task');
	if(renew_date_start != null && renew_date_start.length > 0){
		task_item.addQuery('certificate_renew_date', ">=", renew_date_start);
	}
	if(renew_date_end != null && renew_date_end.length > 0){
		task_item.addQuery('certificate_renew_date', "<=", renew_date_end);
	}
	
	if(manager_id != null && manager_id.length > 0){
		if(employee_name != null && employee_name.length > 0){
			task_item.addQuery('employee_name','CONTAINS', employee_name);
			task_item.addQuery('manager_id', manager_id);
		}
		else{
			var tmp = task_item.addQuery('employee_id', manager_id);
			tmp.addOrCondition('manager_id',manager_id);
		}
	}
	else{
		if(employee_name != null && employee_name.length > 0){
			task_item.addQuery('employee_name','CONTAINS', employee_name);
		}
		if(manager_name != null && manager_name.length > 0){
			task_item.addQuery('manager','CONTAINS', manager_name);
		}
	}
	
	if(organization != null && organization.length > 0){
		task_item.addQuery('organization','CONTAINS', organization);
	}
	if(funded_by != null && funded_by.length > 0){
		task_item.addQuery('research_funded_by', funded_by);
	}
	if(employee_type != null && employee_type.length > 0){
		task_item.addQuery('employee_type', employee_type);
	}	
	if(certificate_type != null && certificate_type.length > 0){
		task_item.addQuery('certificate_type', certificate_type);
	}	
	if(stage != null && stage.length > 0){
		task_item.addQuery('stage', stage);
	}
	if(active != null && active.length > 0){
		task_item.addQuery('active', active);
	}		
	task_item.orderByDesc('certificate_completion_date');
	task_item.query();
	while(task_item.next()){
		var item = {};
		item.sys_id = task_item.sys_id.toString();
		item.name = task_item.getDisplayValue('certificate_name');
		item.type = task_item.getDisplayValue('certificate_type');
		item.employee_id = task_item.getDisplayValue('employee_id');
		item.employee = task_item.getDisplayValue('employee_name');
		item.c_date = Date.parse(task_item.getDisplayValue('certificate_completion_date'));
		item.rr_date = Date.parse(task_item.getDisplayValue('certificate_renew_date'));
		item.manager = task_item.getDisplayValue('manager');
		item.doc = task_item.getDisplayValue('organization');
		item.status = task_item.getDisplayValue('stage');
		item.active = task_item.getDisplayValue('active');
		if(!item.active){
			item.status = "Archived";
		}
		var attachment =  new GlideRecord('sys_attachment');
		attachment.addQuery('table_sys_id',task_item.sys_id);
		attachment.query();
		attachment.next();
		item.attachment_id = attachment.sys_id.toString();	
		task_items.push(item);
	}
	return task_items;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_naci_gcp/gcprestapi/getReport</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/getReport</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-15 14:25:09</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>c676cbffdbfb5b40b86770c08c961927</sys_id><sys_mod_count>16</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getReport</sys_name><sys_package display_value="gcp" source="x_naci_gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_c676cbffdbfb5b40b86770c08c961927</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>yuw5@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-24 14:18:31</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="gcpRestAPI">b36bbd43dba3db0054d8ff621f961968</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

'0' + s : s; } c.upload = function(){ c.data.upload_status = 'uploading...'; var sessionId = c.data.sessionId; var input = $('#certificate-hidden')[0]; var file = input.files[0]; if(file.type !== 'application/pdf'){ $('#messageContent').html(GCPConstants.errorMessage[5]); $('#messageDiv').modal('show'); c.data.upload_status = 'upload'; } else if(file.size >= 18874368){ $('#messageContent').html(GCPConstants.errorMessage[4]); $('#messageDiv').modal('show'); c.data.upload_status = 'upload'; } else{ readFile(file, function(base64) { var d = new Date(c.data.completedDate); var completedDate = [pad(d.getMonth()+1), pad(d.getDate()), d.getFullYear()].join('/'); d.setFullYear(d.getFullYear() + 3); var dataRenew = [pad(d.getMonth()+1), pad(d.getDate()), d.getFullYear()].join('/'); var filename = c.data.employee_name+'_'+c.data.trainingType.label +'_GCP_' +completedDate.replace(/\//g,''); var params = { employeeName : c.data.employee_name, employeeId : c.data.employee_id, nedId : c.data.employee_netId, supervisorName : c.data.supervisor_name, supervisorId : c.data.supervisor_id, doc : c.data.employee_doc, trainingType : c.data.trainingType.value, employeeType: c.data.employee_type, dateComplete : completedDate, dateRenew : dataRenew, fundedBy : c.data.fundedBy, fileName : filename }; GCPUploadCertificate.uploadCertificate(params,sessionId) .then(function(res) { if(res.data.result == "1" || res.data.result == "2"){ c.data.upload_status = 'upload'; $('#messageContent').html(GCPConstants.errorMessage[parseInt(res.data.result)]); $('#messageDiv').modal('show'); return new Promise(function(resolve, reject){ resolve(); }); } else{ var attach = { sys_id: res.data.result, fileName: filename, fileContents : base64 }; return GCPUploadCertificate.uploadPDF(attach, sessionId); } }, function(error){ console.log(error); }).then(function(response){ if(response){ c.data.upload_status = 'upload'; $('#messageContent').html(GCPConstants.errorMessage[0]); $('#messageDiv').modal('show'); } }, function(error){ console.log(error); }); }); } } window.showMessageBox = function(message){ $('#messageContent').html(message); $('#messageDiv').modal('show'); } c.closeMessageBox = function(){ $('#messageDiv').modal('hide'); } c.getPromise = function(sessionId, dropdownName){ return new Promise(function(resolve){ $http({ url: '/api/x_naci_gcp/gcprestapi/getDropOptions', method : "GET", beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId); }, headers: {'Content-Type': 'application/json'}, params: {name:dropdownName} }).then(resolve); }); } }]]>c.file-section{ width:100%; } .input-file-container { display:inline-block; position: relative; sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_email_a12dda06dbf46f00b86770c08c961958
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_email"><sys_script_email action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>GCPSupervisorAOEmail</name><new_lines_to_html>false</new_lines_to_html><script><![CDATA[(function runMailScript(current, template, email, email_action, event) {
	var gr_user = new GlideRecord("sys_user");
	if (gr_user.get(current.manager_id.toString())) {
		email.addAddress("cc",gr_user.email.toString(), '');
		email.addAddress("cc", gr_user.u_ao.email.toString(), '');
	}
})(current, template, email, email_action, event);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_email</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-09-28 17:57:54</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>a12dda06dbf46f00b86770c08c961958</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GCPSupervisorAOEmail</sys_name><sys_package display_value="gcp" source="x_naci_gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_email_a12dda06dbf46f00b86770c08c961958</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-28 18:07:07</sys_updated_on></sys_script_email></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_1b090200dbf39f0054d8ff621f9619ce
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>GET</http_method><name>getDropOptions</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	var type = request.queryParams.name;
	var options = [];
	var option_item = new GlideRecord('x_naci_gcp_gcp_drop_options');
		option_item.addQuery('name', type);
		option_item.addQuery('active', true);
		option_item.orderBy('label');
	option_item.query();
	while(option_item.next()){
		var item = {};
		item.label = option_item.getDisplayValue('label');
		item.value = option_item.getDisplayValue('value');
		options.push(item);
	}
    
	return options;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_naci_gcp/gcprestapi/getDropOptions</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/getDropOptions</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-03 18:19:35</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>1b090200dbf39f0054d8ff621f9619ce</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getDropOptions</sys_name><sys_package display_value="gcp" source="x_naci_gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_1b090200dbf39f0054d8ff621f9619ce</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-03 18:59:36</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="gcpRestAPI">b36bbd43dba3db0054d8ff621f961968</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>GCPReportSearch</name><script><![CDATA[function GCPReportSearch($http){
	this.getReport = function(sessionId, criteria){
		return new Promise(function(resolve, reject){
			$http({
				 url: '/api/x_naci_gcp/gcprestapi/getReport',
				 method : "GET",
				 beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId); },
				 headers: {'Content-Type': 'application/json'},
				 params: {renew_date_start: criteria.renew_date_start,
									renew_date_end: criteria.renew_date_end,
									employee_name: criteria.employee_name,
									manager_id:criteria.manager_id, 
									manager_name:criteria.manager_name, 
									organization:criteria.organization,
									funded_by:criteria.funded_by,
									employee_type: criteria.employee_type,
									stage:criteria.stage,
									certificate_type:criteria.certificate_type, 
									active:criteria.active}	
			}).then(resolve, reject);
		});
	};
	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-15 18:39:26</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>41a00800dbcc6b40b86770c08c961913</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GCPReportSearch</sys_name><sys_package display_value="gcp" source="x_naci_gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_41a00800dbcc6b40b86770c08c961913</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>yuw5@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-16 19:54:25</sys_updated_on><type>service</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>GCPHistoryData</name><script><![CDATA[function GCPHistoryData($http){
	this.getHistoryData = function(employee_id, trainingType, sessionId){
		return new Promise(function(resolve, reject){
			$http({
				 url: '/api/x_naci_gcp/gcprestapi/getInactiveRecords',
				 method : "GET",
				 beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId); },
				 headers: {'Content-Type': 'application/json'},
				 params: {employee_id:employee_id, trainingType:trainingType}
			}).then(resolve, reject);
		});
	};
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-13 15:57:35</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>7f588d5bdbbfd740b86770c08c9619e9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GCPHistoryData</sys_name><sys_package display_value="gcp" source="x_naci_gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_7f588d5bdbbfd740b86770c08c9619e9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>yuw5@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-13 16:40:14</sys_updated_on><type>service</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>

/* Layout helpers

.ui-helper-hidden {
	display: none;
}
.ui-helper-hidden-accessible {

	height: 1px;
	margin: -1px;
	overflow: hidden;
	padding: 0;
	position: absolute;
	width: 1px;
}
.ui-helper-reset {
	margin: 0;
	padding: 0;
	border: 0;
	outline: 0;
	line-height: 1.3;
	text-decoration: none;
	font-size: 100%;
	list-style: none;
}
.ui-helper-clearfix:before,
.ui-helper-clearfix:after {
	content: "";
	display: table;
	border-collapse: collapse;
}
.ui-helper-clearfix:after {
	clear: both;
}
.ui-helper-zfix {

	height: 100%;
	top: 0;
	left: 0;
	position: absolute;
	opacity: 0;
	filter:Alpha(Opacity=0); /* support: IE8 */

.ui-state-disabled {

	display: block;

/* Misc visuals
----------------------------------*/

/* Overlays */
.ui-widget-overlay {
	position: fixed;
	top: 0;
	left: 0;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
}

}
.ui-priority-secondary,
.ui-widget-content .ui-priority-secondary,
.ui-widget-header .ui-priority-secondary {
	opacity: .7;
	filter:Alpha(Opacity=70); /* support: IE8 */
	font-weight: normal;
}
.ui-state-disabled,
.ui-widget-content .ui-state-disabled,
.ui-widget-header .ui-state-disabled {
	opacity: .35;
	filter:Alpha(Opacity=35); /* support: IE8 */
	background-image: none;
}
.ui-state-disabled .ui-icon {
	filter:Alpha(Opacity=35); /* support: IE8 - See #6059 */
}

/* Icons
----------------------------------*/

/* states and images */
.ui-icon {
	width: 16px;
	height: 16px;
}
.ui-icon,
.ui-widget-content .ui-icon {
	background-image: url("images/ui-icons_444444_256x240.png");
}
.ui-widget-header .ui-icon {
	background-image: url("images/ui-icons_444444_256x240.png");
}
.ui-state-hover .ui-icon,
.ui-state-focus .ui-icon,
.ui-button:hover .ui-icon,
.ui-button:focus .ui-icon {
	background-image: url("images/ui-icons_555555_256x240.png");
}
.ui-state-active .ui-icon,
.ui-button:active .ui-icon {
	background-image: url("images/ui-icons_ffffff_256x240.png");
}
.ui-state-highlight .ui-icon,
.ui-button .ui-state-highlight.ui-icon {
	background-image: url("images/ui-icons_777620_256x240.png");
}
.ui-state-error .ui-icon,
.ui-state-error-text .ui-icon {
	background-image: url("images/ui-icons_cc0000_256x240.png");
}
.ui-button .ui-icon {
	background-image: url("images/ui-icons_777777_256x240.png");
}

/* Misc visuals
----------------------------------*/

/* Corner radius */
.ui-corner-all,
.ui-corner-top,
.ui-corner-left,
.ui-corner-tl {
	border-top-left-radius: 3px;
}
.ui-corner-all,
.ui-corner-top,
.ui-corner-right,
.ui-corner-tr {
	border-top-right-radius: 3px;
}
.ui-corner-all,
.ui-corner-bottom,
.ui-corner-left,
.ui-corner-bl {
	border-bottom-left-radius: 3px;
}
.ui-corner-all,
.ui-corner-bottom,
.ui-corner-right,
.ui-corner-br {
	border-bottom-right-radius: 3px;
}

/* Overlays */
.ui-widget-overlay {
	background: #aaaaaa;
	opacity: .003;
	filter: Alpha(Opacity=.3); /* support: IE8 */
}
.ui-widget-shadow {
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px #666666;
	box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px #666666;
}

sys_update_xml.payload: custom= 0) { temp = term.split(','); var length = temp.length; if (length > 1) { term = temp[1].trim() + " " + temp[0].trim(); } else { term = temp[0]; } } var req = { method: 'GET', url: '/api/x_naci_gcp/gcprestapi/fetchUsers', beforeSend: function(xhr) { xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId); }, headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, params: { 'term': term } }; $http(req).then(handleResponse, handleError); function handleResponse(responseData) { var result = responseData.data.result; response(result); } function handleError(response) { console.error(response); alert('ERROR'); } }, autoFocus: true, select: function(event, ui) { var title = ui.item.title; c.data.d_employee_name = ui.item.value; c.data.d_employee_id = ui.item.id; c.data.deactiveDisabled = false; $scope.$apply(); } }); c.confirmDeactive = function(){ GCPUtil.deactivateUser(c.data.d_employee_id, c.data.manager_id, c.data.sessionId).then(function(res){ window.showMessageBox(GCPConstants.getDeactiveError(parseInt(res.data.result))); $('#deactive_popup').modal('hide'); },function(error){ console.log(error); }); } c.cancelDeactive = function(){ $('#deactive_popup').modal('hide'); } }]]>csp_instancefalsegcp-deactivefalsegcp deactivefalsefalsesp_widgetyuw5@nih.gov2018-08-17 19:57:41falsefdd52ea8db0ceb40b86770c08c96193428gcp deactive609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2false609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2sp_widget_fdd52ea8db0ceb40b86770c08c961934yuw5@nih.gov2018-08-27 21:56:48

	var gr_user = new GlideRecord("sys_user");
	gs.error("jim---" + current.manager);
	if (gr_user.get(current.manager.sys_id.toString())) {
		email.addAddress("cc",gr_user.email.toString(), '');
	}
})(current, template, email, email_action, event);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_email</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-09-27 18:57:41</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>d680e9f1dbb46f0054d8ff621f9619b9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GCPRequestTrainingCCSupervisor</sys_name><sys_package display_value="gcp" source="x_naci_gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_email_d680e9f1dbb46f0054d8ff621f9619b9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-27 20:25:55</sys_updated_on></sys_script_email></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_8d9f8a63dbbf1b40b86770c08c96199d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>POST</http_method><name>uploadPdfFile</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	var data = request.body.data;
	var fileName = data.fileName;
	var fileContents = data.fileContents;
	var gcp_id = data.sys_id;
	
    var attachement = new GlideSysAttachment();
	var gr = new GlideRecord("x_naci_gcp_gcp_task");
	var record = gr.get(gcp_id);
	var attachment_sys_id = attachement.writeBase64(gr, fileName , "application/pdf", fileContents);
	
	if(attachment_sys_id != null && attachment_sys_id.length > 0){
		return "0";
	}else{
		return "3";
	}

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_naci_gcp/gcprestapi/uploadPdfFile</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/uploadPdfFile</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-14 15:48:44</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>8d9f8a63dbbf1b40b86770c08c96199d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>uploadPdfFile</sys_name><sys_package display_value="gcp" source="x_naci_gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_8d9f8a63dbbf1b40b86770c08c96199d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-14 15:48:44</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="gcpRestAPI">b36bbd43dba3db0054d8ff621f961968</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_1902cf51db7b534054d8ff621f96194e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>GET</http_method><name>isManage</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	var userId = request.queryParams.sysId;

	var item = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		item.addQuery('manager', userId);
		item.query();

	var count =  item.getRowCount();
	if(count > 0){
		return "yes";
	}else{
		return "no";
	}

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_naci_gcp/gcprestapi/isManage</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/isManage</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-07 19:44:01</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>1902cf51db7b534054d8ff621f96194e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>isManage</sys_name><sys_package display_value="gcp" source="x_naci_gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_1902cf51db7b534054d8ff621f96194e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-07 19:44:01</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="gcpRestAPI">b36bbd43dba3db0054d8ff621f961968</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: custom 3){ c.filterTraining(); } } c.filterTraining = function(){ } c.showAcceptConfirm = function(sys_id){ c.data.currentSysId = sys_id; $('#confirmDiv').modal('show'); } c.acceptTraining = function(){ var dt = {}; dt.sysId = c.data.currentSysId; dt.comment = ""; dt.role = GCPConstants.getRole(); dt.action = GCPConstants.getApprove(); dt.sessionId = c.data.sessionId; GCPApprovalProcess.processApproval(dt.sysId,dt.comment,dt.role,dt.action,dt.sessionId).then(function(res){ $('#confirmDiv').modal('hide'); },function(error){ console.log(error); }); } c.cancelAccept = function(){ $('#confirmDiv').modal('hide'); } c.showRejectConfirm = function(sys_id){ window.displayRejectDialog(sys_id); } c.showHistory = function(employee_id,type){ GCPHistoryData.getHistoryData(employee_id,type,c.data.sessionId).then(function(res){ window.displayHistoryDialog(res.data.result); },function(error){ console.log(error); }); } c.showTrainingRequest = function(){ window.displayTrainingRequest(); } c.deactiveUser = function(){ window.displayDeactiveDialog(); } spUtil.recordWatch($scope, "x_naci_gcp_gcp_task", "", function(name, data) { spUtil.update($scope); }); }]]>csp_instancefalsegcp-employee-trainingsfalsegcp employee trainingsfalsefalsesp_widgetyuw5@nih.gov2018-07-31 18:27:43false163ee28bdb27db0054d8ff621f9619cb102gcp employee trainings609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2false609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2sp_widget_163ee28bdb27db0054d8ff621f9619cbyuw5@nih.gov2018-09-11 15:56:16

sys_update_xml.name: sysevent_email_action_6c52debedbc0a300b86770c08c96197e
sys_update_xml.payload:
falsefalsetruec97d83137f4432005f58108c3ffa917ax_naci_gcp_gcp_tasktext/html 

 

]]>falsex_naci_gcp.send_Expired_Reminderfalsetruefalsefalseeventfalseevent.parm1falseDear ${employee_name},

As you may be aware, NIH employees are required to complete a Good Clinical Practice (GCP) training course at a minimum of every three years.

You are receiving this email because your current GCP training is expiring and you need to renew no later than ${certificate_renew_date}

You may register to complete one of the following NCI recommended free GCP courses online by selecting one of the links below.

  • National Institute on Drug Abuse (NIDA) course titled "National Drug Abuse Treatment Clinical Trials Network Good Clinical Practice"
  • Collaborative Institutional Training Initiative Program (CITI)
  • National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases (NIAID) GCP Learning Center
  • NIH Good Clinical Practice for Behavioral and Social Sciences Training (00162946)

 General questions or concerns about this training should be directed to your supervisor / Project officer, ${manager}.   If you need technical assistance or have questions regarding the training, please contact the appropriate help desk associated with the training you have selected to complete.  If you need technical assistance with uploading your document(s), please contact: NCI GCP Web Admin

 Once you have completed your training, please go to Training Certificate Repository to upload your completed certificate(s).  For best results, please use "Print to PDF" when completing training to output a pdf to upload to this site or you may scan the printed certificate and save as a pdf to upload.

 Note:  If you have more than one certificate (i.e. the course provides individual certificates for each section of their course), you must combine those into one pdf document prior to uploading. A pdf Adobe Portfolio is not permitted for this upload.

 
]]>GCP Employee Training expiredfalse100falsetrue

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_ea8b31c3dba3db0054d8ff621f96195f
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>GET</http_method><name>fetchUsers</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	 var users = [];
	 var searchCriteria = request.queryParams.term.toString();
	 var term = searchCriteria.split(" ");
	 var length = term.length;
	 var firstName = term[0];
	 var lastName = term.pop();

	var user_item = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
	     user_item.addQuery('first_name', 'STARTSWITH', firstName);
         if(length > 1) {
			 user_item.addQuery('last_name', 'STARTSWITH', lastName);
		 }
         user_item.query();
	 //var index = 0;
     while(user_item.next()){
		 var value = user_item.getDisplayValue('first_name') + " " + user_item.getDisplayValue('last_name');
		 var label = value;
		 var id = user_item.getDisplayValue('sys_id');
		 var email = user_item.getDisplayValue('email');
		 var phone = user_item.getDisplayValue('phone');
		 var title = user_item.getDisplayValue('title');
		 if (email) {
			 label += "  [" + email + "]";
		 }
		 users.push({label: label, value: value, id: id, email: email, phone: phone, title: title});
     }
   
     return users;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_naci_gcp/gcprestapi/fetchUsers</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/fetchUsers</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-07-31 14:46:58</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>ea8b31c3dba3db0054d8ff621f96195f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>fetchUsers</sys_name><sys_package display_value="gcp" source="x_naci_gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_ea8b31c3dba3db0054d8ff621f96195f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-07-31 14:47:24</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="gcpRestAPI">b36bbd43dba3db0054d8ff621f961968</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>GCPApprovalProcess</name><script><![CDATA[function GCPApprovalProcess($http){
	this.processApproval = function(sysId, comments, role, action, sessionId){
		return new Promise(function(resolve, reject){
			$http({
				 url: '/api/x_naci_gcp/gcprestapi/gcpApprovalProcess',
				 method : "POST",
				 beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId); },
				 headers: {'Content-Type': 'application/json'},
				 data: {sysId: sysId, comments: comments, role: role, action:action} 				
			}).then(resolve, reject);
		});
	};
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>pansu@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-07 20:33:53</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>6f5b4bd5db7b534054d8ff621f9619d5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GCPApprovalProcess</sys_name><sys_package display_value="gcp" source="x_naci_gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_6f5b4bd5db7b534054d8ff621f9619d5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>yuw5@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-09 17:04:24</sys_updated_on><type>service</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_angular_provider_35030b91db7b534054d8ff621f96199a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>GCPUtil</name><script><![CDATA[function GCPUtil($http) {
	this.isManager = function(sysId, sessionId){
		return new Promise(function(resolve, reject){
			$http({
				 url: '/api/x_naci_gcp/gcprestapi/isManage',
				 method : "GET",
				 beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId); },
				 headers: {'Content-Type': 'application/json'},
				 params: {sysId:sysId}			
			}).then(resolve, reject);
		});
	};
	/**
		deactivateUser params:
		1) employee ID - employee sys_id 
		2) manager ID - manager sys_id 
	**/
	this.deactivateUser = function(employeeId, managerId, sessionId){
		return new Promise(function(resolve, reject){
			$http({
				 url: '/api/x_naci_gcp/gcprestapi/deactiveUser',
				 method : "POST",
				 beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId); },
				 headers: {'Content-Type': 'application/json'},
				 data: {employeeId: employeeId, managerId: managerId}			
			}).then(resolve, reject);
		});
		
	};
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-07 19:46:10</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>35030b91db7b534054d8ff621f96199a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GCPUtil</sys_name><sys_package display_value="gcp" source="x_naci_gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_35030b91db7b534054d8ff621f96199a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-17 18:46:11</sys_updated_on><type>service</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_01610513dbbfd740b86770c08c9619db
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>GET</http_method><name>getInactiveRecords</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	var userId = request.queryParams.employee_id;
	var trainingType = request.queryParams.trainingType;
	var historyRecords = [];
	var gcp_item = new GlideRecord('x_naci_gcp_gcp_task');
		gcp_item.addQuery('employee_id', userId);
		//gcp_item.addQuery('certificate_type', trainingType);
		//gcp_item.addQuery('active', false);
		gcp_item.orderByDesc('certificate_completion_date');
		gcp_item.query();
	while(gcp_item.next()){
		var item = {};
		item.sys_id = gcp_item.sys_id.toString();
		item.certificate_name = gcp_item.getDisplayValue('certificate_name');
		item.certificate_completed_date = gcp_item.getDisplayValue('certificate_completion_date');
		item.status = gcp_item.getDisplayValue('stage');
		item.active = gcp_item.getDisplayValue('active');
		//item.manager = gcp_item.manager.toString();
		//item.organization = gcp_item.organization.toString();
		//item.research_funded_by = gcp_item.research_funded_by.toString();
		//item.employee_name = gcp_item.employee_name.toString();
		var attach_item = new GlideRecord('sys_attachment');   
			attach_item.addQuery('table_sys_id', item.sys_id);
			attach_item.query();
			attach_item.next();
		item.attachment_id = attach_item.sys_id.toString();
		historyRecords.push(item);
	}
	return historyRecords;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_naci_gcp/gcprestapi/getInactiveRecords</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/getInactiveRecords</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-13 15:41:58</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>01610513dbbfd740b86770c08c9619db</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getInactiveRecords</sys_name><sys_package display_value="gcp" source="x_naci_gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_01610513dbbfd740b86770c08c9619db</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>yuw5@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-11 16:52:30</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="gcpRestAPI">b36bbd43dba3db0054d8ff621f961968</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

	_disable: function() {

	open: function( event ) {

	_updateContent: function( target, event ) {

	_registerCloseHandlers: function( event, target ) {

	_tooltip: function( element ) {

}

var widgetsTooltip = $.ui.tooltip;

sys_update_xml.name: sysevent_email_action_010ab2c0db58670054d8ff621f9619ae
sys_update_xml.payload:
falsefalsetruec97d83137f4432005f58108c3ffa917ax_naci_gcp_gcp_tasktext/html 

 

]]>falsex_naci_gcp.send_Expired_reminder_Monthfalsetruefalsefalseeventfalseevent.parm1falseDear ${employee_name},

As you may be aware, NIH employees are required to complete a Good Clinical Practice (GCP) training course at a minimum of every three years.

You are receiving this email because your current GCP training is expiring and you need to renew no later than ${certificate_renew_date}

You may register to complete one of the following NCI recommended free GCP courses online by selecting one of the links below.

  • National Institute on Drug Abuse (NIDA) course titled "National Drug Abuse Treatment Clinical Trials Network Good Clinical Practice"
  • Collaborative Institutional Training Initiative Program (CITI)
  • National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases (NIAID) GCP Learning Center
  • NIH Good Clinical Practice for Behavioral and Social Sciences Training (00162946)

 General questions or concerns about this training should be directed to your supervisor / Project officer, ${manager}.   If you need technical assistance or have questions regarding the training, please contact the appropriate help desk associated with the training you have selected to complete.  If you need technical assistance with uploading your document(s), please contact: NCI GCP Web Admin

 Once you have completed your training, please go to Training Certificate Repository to upload your completed certificate(s).  For best results, please use "Print to PDF" when completing training to output a pdf to upload to this site or you may scan the printed certificate and save as a pdf to upload.

 Note:  If you have more than one certificate (i.e. the course provides individual certificates for each section of their course), you must combine those into one pdf document prior to uploading. A pdf Adobe Portfolio is not permitted for this upload.

  ${mail_script:GCPSupervisorEmail}

]]>GCP Employee Training expired in a Monthfalse100falsetrue
sys_update_xml.target_name: GCP Employee Training expired in a Month

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_e8a7c355db7b534054d8ff621f9619f6
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>POST</http_method><name>gcpApprovalProcess</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	var data = request.body.data;
	var sysId = data.sysId;
	var role = data.role;
	var comments = data.comments;
	var action = data.action;
	
	var gr1 = new GlideRecord("x_naci_gcp_gcp_task");
        gr1.addQuery("sys_id", sysId);
        gr1.query();
        gr1.next();
	    var employeeId = gr1.getDisplayValue('employee_id');
	    var trainingType = gr1.getDisplayValue('certificate_type');
		gr1.comments = '(startAction)' + action + '(endAction)(startComments)' +comments + '(endComments)(role)' + role + '(ENDROLE)' + gs.getUser().getFirstName() + ' ' + gs.getUser().getLastName() + 'ENDCOMMENTS';	
	    gr1.approval_action = action;
	    gr1.comment = comments;
		gr1.update();
	
	if(action == 'approved'){
		//archive previous trainings for the same person records
		var idList = [];
		var gr2 = new GlideRecord('x_naci_gcp_gcp_task');
			gr2.addQuery('employee_id', employeeId);
			//gr2.addQuery('certificate_type', trainingType);
			gr2.addQuery('active', true);
			gr2.query();
		while(gr2.next()){
			var id = gr2.sys_id.toString();
			if(id != sysId){
				idList.push(id);
			}
		}

		for(var i = 0; i < idList.length; i++){
			var gr3 = new GlideRecord('x_naci_gcp_gcp_task');
				gr3.addQuery('sys_id', idList[i]);
				gr3.query();
				gr3.next();
				gr3.active = false;
				gr3.update();
		}
	}
	
	
	return "success";
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_naci_gcp/gcprestapi/gcpApprovalProcess</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/gcpApprovalProcess</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-07 20:06:53</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>e8a7c355db7b534054d8ff621f9619f6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>gcpApprovalProcess</sys_name><sys_package display_value="gcp" source="x_naci_gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_e8a7c355db7b534054d8ff621f9619f6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>yuw5@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-17 20:45:29</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="gcpRestAPI">b36bbd43dba3db0054d8ff621f961968</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

.modal {
  text-align: center;
  padding: 0!important;
}

.modal:before {
  content: '';
  display: inline-block;
  height: 100%;
  vertical-align: middle;
  margin-right: -4px;
}

.modal-dialog {
  display: inline-block;
  text-align: left;

sys_update_xml.payload: custom= 0) { temp = term.split(','); var length = temp.length; if (length > 1) { term = temp[1].trim() + " " + temp[0].trim(); } else { term = temp[0]; } } var req = { method: 'GET', url: '/api/x_naci_gcp/gcprestapi/fetchUsers', beforeSend: function(xhr) { xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId); }, headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, params: { 'term': term } }; $http(req).then(handleResponse, handleError); function handleResponse(responseData) { var result = responseData.data.result; response(result); } function handleError(response) { console.error(response); alert('ERROR'); } }, autoFocus: true, select: function(event, ui) { var title = ui.item.title; c.data.t_employee_name = ui.item.value; c.data.t_employee_id = ui.item.id; c.data.t_employee_email = ui.item.email; c.data.requestDisabled = false; $scope.$apply(); } }); c.sendRequest = function(){ GCPSendEmail.sendTraining(c.data.sessionId,c.data.t_employee_name,c.data.t_employee_id,c.data.employeeId, c.data.t_employee_email).then(function(res){ window.showMessageBox(GCPConstants.getRequestError(parseInt(res.data.result))); $('#request_popup').modal('hide'); },function(error){ console.log(error); }); } c.cancelRequest = function(){ $('#request_popup').modal('hide'); } }]]>csp_instancefalsegcp-training-requestfalsegcp training requestfalsefalsesp_widgetyuw5@nih.gov2018-08-06 15:04:17falsef039b049db375340b86770c08c96193765gcp training request609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2false609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2sp_widget_f039b049db375340b86770c08c961937yuw5@nih.gov2018-08-27 21:56:17

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_email_bc7b9dbddb746f0054d8ff621f9619f1
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_email"><sys_script_email action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>x_naci_gcp_gcp_task_script_1</name><new_lines_to_html>false</new_lines_to_html><script><![CDATA[var gr_user = new GlideRecord("sys_user");
            gr_user.addQuery('sys_id', ${event.parm2});
      gr_user.query();
      gr_user.next();
      var manager_id = gr_user.manager.sys_id;    
      var manager = new GlideRecord("sys_user");
      if (manager.get(manager_id.toString())){
        email.addAddress("cc",gr_user.email.toString(), '');
      }]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_email</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-09-27 18:32:10</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>bc7b9dbddb746f0054d8ff621f9619f1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_naci_gcp_gcp_task_script_1</sys_name><sys_package display_value="gcp" source="x_naci_gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_email_bc7b9dbddb746f0054d8ff621f9619f1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-27 18:32:10</sys_updated_on></sys_script_email></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_4059593bdb275f0054d8ff621f9619a0
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>POST</http_method><name>uploadCertificate</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	var data = request.body.data;
	var employeeName = data.employeeName;
	var employeeId = data.employeeId;
	var nedId = data.nedId;
	var managerName = data.supervisorName;
	var managerId = data.supervisorId;
	var doc = data.doc;
	var trainingType = data.trainingType;
	var employeeType = data.employeeType;
	var dateCompleted = data.dateComplete;
	var dateRenew = data.dateRenew;
	var fundedBy = data.fundedBy;
	var fileName = data.fileName;
	
	//validation 1, data complete date is less than current record,  ignore the status, cannot submit
	var validate1 = new GlideRecord('x_naci_gcp_gcp_task');
		//validate1.addQuery('certificate_type', trainingType);
		validate1.addQuery('employee_id', employeeId);
		//validate1.orderByDesc('sys_created_on');
		validate1.orderByDesc('certificate_completion_date');
		validate1.query();
		if(validate1.getRowCount() > 0){
			//first record is most recent record
			validate1.next();
			var completedDate = validate1.getDisplayValue('certificate_completion_date');
			//validation 1, data complete date is less than current record,  ignore the status, cannot submit
			if(new Date(dateCompleted) < new Date(completedDate)){
				return "1";
			}
			//validation 2, the same training, the current status is pending acceptance, cannot submit 
			var stage = validate1.getDisplayValue('stage');
			if(stage == 'Pending Acceptance'){
				return "2";
			}
		}
	
	//store record into gcp task table
	var gcp_item = new GlideRecord('x_naci_gcp_gcp_task');
		gcp_item.initialize();
	    gcp_item.apply_for = employeeId;
	    gcp_item.certificate_name = fileName;
		gcp_item.employee_name = employeeName;
		gcp_item.employee_id = employeeId;
		gcp_item.manager = managerName;
		gcp_item.manager_id = managerId;
	    gcp_item.ned_id = nedId;
		gcp_item.organization = doc;
		gcp_item.certificate_type = trainingType;
		gcp_item.employee_type = employeeType;
		gcp_item.certificate_completion_date = dateCompleted;
	    gcp_item.certificate_renew_date = dateRenew;
		gcp_item.research_funded_by = fundedBy;
	var gcp_id = gcp_item.insert();
	return gcp_id;

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_naci_gcp/gcprestapi/uploadCertificate</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/uploadCertificate</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-02 20:17:12</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>4059593bdb275f0054d8ff621f9619a0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>44</sys_mod_count><sys_name>uploadCertificate</sys_name><sys_package display_value="gcp" source="x_naci_gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_4059593bdb275f0054d8ff621f9619a0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>yuw5@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-11 15:13:35</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="gcpRestAPI">b36bbd43dba3db0054d8ff621f961968</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_angular_provider_63dd9680db379f0054d8ff621f961905
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>GCPUploadCertificate</name><script><![CDATA[function GCPUploadCertificate($http){
	this.uploadCertificate = function(params, sessionId){
		/** params contain all GUI  input data and file contents with Base64 format.
			params format is shown as below
			params = {
				employeeName : x1,
				employeeId : x2,
				nedId : x3,
				supervisorName : x4,
				supervisorId : x5,
				doc : x6,
				trainingType : x7,
				dateComplete : x8,
				dateRenew : x9,
				fundedBy : x10,
				fileName : x11,
				fileContents : x12
			}
		**/
		return new Promise(function(resolve, reject){
			$http({
				 url: '/api/x_naci_gcp/gcprestapi/uploadCertificate',
				 method : "POST",
				 beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId); },
				 headers: {'Content-Type': 'application/json'},
				 data: JSON.stringify(params),
				 processData: false
			}).then(resolve, reject);
		});
	};
	
	this.uploadPDF = function(params, sessionId){
		return new Promise(function(resolve, reject){
			$http({
				 url: '/api/x_naci_gcp/gcprestapi/uploadPdfFile',
				 method : "POST",
				 beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId); },
				 headers: {'Content-Type': 'application/json'},
				 data: JSON.stringify(params),
				 processData: false
			}).then(resolve, reject);
		});
	};
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-03 19:51:28</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>63dd9680db379f0054d8ff621f961905</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GCPUploadCertificate</sys_name><sys_package display_value="gcp" source="x_naci_gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_63dd9680db379f0054d8ff621f961905</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>yuw5@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-14 17:49:31</sys_updated_on><type>service</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>GCPSendEmail</name><script><![CDATA[function GCPSendEmail($http) {
	this.sendTraining = function(sessionId, userName,employeeId,managerId, userEmail){
		return new Promise(function(resolve, reject){
			$http({
				 url: '/api/x_naci_gcp/gcprestapi/sendEmail',
				 method : "POST",
				 beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId); },
				 headers: {'Content-Type': 'application/json'},
				 data: {user_name: userName,
								employeeId: employeeId,
								managerId: managerId,
								user_email: userEmail}
			}).then(resolve, reject);
		});
	};
	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-09 19:12:09</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>1e6ec186dbf71740b86770c08c9619a0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GCPSendEmail</sys_name><sys_package display_value="gcp" source="x_naci_gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_1e6ec186dbf71740b86770c08c9619a0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>yuw5@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-17 21:57:47</sys_updated_on><type>service</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysevent_email_action_ca67e802db771740b86770c08c961926
sys_update_xml.payload:
falsefalsetruec97d83137f4432005f58108c3ffa917ax_naci_gcp_gcp_tasktext/html 

 

]]>falsex_naci_gcp.sending_training_requestfalsetruefalsefalseeventfalseevent.parm1falseHello ${event.parm1},

 As you may be aware, NIH employees involved in the design, conduct, oversight and management of NIH-funded clinical trials are required to complete a GCP training course at a minimum of every three years.    Your new position includes clinical trials related responsibilities and you are required to complete GCP training within 30 days of employment.

 You may register to complete one of the following NCI recommended free GCP courses online by selecting one of the links below.

  •  National Institute on Drug Abuse (NIDA) course titled "National Drug Abuse Treatment Clinical Trials Network Good Clinical Practice"
  •  Collaborative Institutional Training Initiative Program (CITI)
  •  National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases (NIAID) GCP Learning Center
  •  NIH Good Clinical Practice for Behavioral and Social Sciences Training (00162946)

 If you experience technical issues when logging into one of these online courses, please contact the help desk associated with that training.   Please contact NCI GCP Web Admin for all other inquiries regarding this email.

Once you have completed your training, please go to Training Certificate Repository to upload your completed certificate(s).  For best results, please use "Print to PDF" when completing training to output a pdf to upload to this site or you may scan the printed certificate and save as a pdf to upload.

Note:  If you have more than one certificate (i.e. the course provides individual certificates for each section of their course), you must combine those into one pdf document prior to uploading. A pdf Adobe Portfolio is not permitted for this upload.

 
 
${mail_script:GCPRequestTrainingCCSupervisor}
]]>Employee Training Notificationfalse100falsetrue

sys_update_xml.name: sysauto_script_a8c4fa2fdbff1b40b86770c08c961953
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysauto_script"><sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><condition/><conditional>false</conditional><name>GCP check certificate past due</name><run_as display_value="Jim Zhou">7acff4a96f6f2100e04fd15eae3ee451</run_as><run_as_tz/><run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_period/><run_start>2018-08-14 18:28:56</run_start><run_time>1970-01-01 17:00:00</run_time><run_type>weekly</run_type><script><![CDATA[//query database to get all people who's certificate has already expired
//either send group email or loop all people to send an individual one.
var userName = '';
var userEmail = '';
var nowTime = new GlideDateTime();
var item = new GlideRecord('x_naci_gcp_gcp_task');
	//only active and accepted training should be counted 
	item.addQuery('stage', 'Accepted');
    item.addQuery('active', true);
    item.addQuery('certificate_renew_date', '<', nowTime);
    item.orderBy('certificate_renew_date');
    item.query();
while(item.next()){
	userName = item.employee_name;
	var userId = item.employee_id;
	//get emplyee email address
	var emp = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		emp.addQuery('sys_id', userId);
		emp.query();
		emp.next();
	userEmail = emp.email;
	gs.eventQueue('x_naci_gcp.gcp_past_due_reminder',item, userName, userEmail);
}

]]></script><sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-14 18:29:26</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>a8c4fa2fdbff1b40b86770c08c961953</sys_id><sys_mod_count>29</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GCP check certificate past due</sys_name><sys_package display_value="gcp" source="x_naci_gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysauto_script_a8c4fa2fdbff1b40b86770c08c961953</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>yuw5@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-17 21:12:42</sys_updated_on><upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe></sysauto_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_c830daa0db846b4054d8ff621f961981
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>POST</http_method><name>deactiveUser</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	var employeeId = request.body.data.employeeId;
	var managerId = request.body.data.managerId;
	
	var user_item = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		user_item.addQuery('sys_id', employeeId);
	user_item.query();
	user_item.next();
	if(user_item.manager == null){
		return "1";
	}else{
		var manager = user_item.manager.sys_id;
		if(managerId != manager){
			return "2";
		}else{
			var task_item = new GlideRecord('x_naci_gcp_gcp_task');
				task_item.addQuery('employee_id', employeeId);
				task_item.query();
			task_item.setValue('active', false);
			task_item.updateMultiple();
			return "0";
		}
	}
	
    
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_naci_gcp/gcprestapi/deactiveUser</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/deactiveUser</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-17 18:36:45</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>c830daa0db846b4054d8ff621f961981</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>deactiveUser</sys_name><sys_package display_value="gcp" source="x_naci_gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_c830daa0db846b4054d8ff621f961981</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-17 18:36:45</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="gcpRestAPI">b36bbd43dba3db0054d8ff621f961968</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_email"><sys_script_email action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>GCPSupervisorEmail</name><new_lines_to_html>false</new_lines_to_html><script><![CDATA[(function runMailScript(current, template, email, email_action, event) {
	var gr_user = new GlideRecord("sys_user");
	if (gr_user.get(current.manager_id.toString())) {
		email.addAddress("cc",gr_user.email.toString(), '');
	}
})(current, template, email, email_action, event);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_email</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-28 18:31:51</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>b54bb204db58670054d8ff621f9619f8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GCPSupervisorEmail</sys_name><sys_package display_value="gcp" source="x_naci_gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_email_b54bb204db58670054d8ff621f9619f8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-29 14:10:40</sys_updated_on></sys_script_email></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_3d88e842db771740b86770c08c9619c5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>POST</http_method><name>sendEmail</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
   var userName = request.body.data.user_name;
	var employeeId = request.body.data.employeeId;
	var managerId = request.body.data.managerId;
   var userEmail = request.body.data.user_email;
	
	var user_item = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		user_item.addQuery('sys_id', employeeId);
	user_item.query();
	user_item.next();
	if(user_item.manager == null){
		return "1";
	}else{
		var manager = user_item.manager.sys_id;
		if(managerId != manager){
			return "2";
		}else{
			gs.eventQueue('x_naci_gcp.sending_training_request',user_item, userName, userEmail);
			return "0";
		}
	}
   

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_naci_gcp/gcprestapi/sendEmail</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/sendEmail</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-09 17:06:24</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>3d88e842db771740b86770c08c9619c5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>sendEmail</sys_name><sys_package display_value="gcp" source="x_naci_gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="gcp">609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_3d88e842db771740b86770c08c9619c5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-27 18:47:35</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="gcpRestAPI">b36bbd43dba3db0054d8ff621f961968</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_43aa297adba79b0054d8ff621f9619ca
sys_update_xml.payload: custom -1 ){ var tmp = {}; tmp.Name = t.name; tmp["Training Type"] = t.type; tmp["Employee Name"] = t.employee; tmp["Completion Date"] = long2DateString(t.c_date); tmp["Required Renewal Date"] = long2DateString(t.rr_date); tmp["Supervisor Name"] = t.manager; tmp.Organization = t.doc; data.push(tmp); } }); /* generate a worksheet */ var ws = XLSX.utils.json_to_sheet(data); /* add to workbook */ var wb = XLSX.utils.book_new(); XLSX.utils.book_append_sheet(wb, ws, "sheet1"); /* write workbook and force a download */ var today = new Date(); var dd = today.getDate(); var mm = today.getMonth()+1; var yyyy = today.getFullYear(); if(dd<10) { dd = '0'+dd } if(mm<10) { mm = '0'+mm } today = yyyy + "-"+ mm + "-" + dd; XLSX.writeFile(wb, "GCP_report_"+today+".xlsx"); } c.selectAll = function(){ var selectAll = document.getElementById("selectAllTrainings"); c.data.selectedTrainings = []; if(selectAll.checked){ var tmp = []; c.data.trainings.map(function(obj){ tmp.push(obj.sys_id); }); c.data.selectedTrainings = tmp; } } c.updateSelected = function(item){ if(item.selected){ c.data.selectedTrainings.push(item.sys_id); } else{ var idx = c.data.selectedTrainings.indexOf(item.sys_id); if (idx > -1) { c.data.selectedTrainings.splice(idx, 1); } } } c.showHistory = function(employee_id,type){ GCPHistoryData.getHistoryData(employee_id,type,c.data.sessionId).then(function(res){ window.displayHistoryDialog(res.data.result); },function(error){ console.log(error); }); } } ]]>csp_instancefalsegcp-reportfalsegcp reportfalsefalsesp_widgetyuw5@nih.gov2018-07-30 18:54:06false43aa297adba79b0054d8ff621f9619ca258gcp report609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2false609215f9dbe35b00b86770c08c9619e2sp_widget_43aa297adba79b0054d8ff621f9619cazhoujim@nih.gov2018-09-28 19:16:47
